comment: This lady is cans light of a six pack. She needs to fade away. But then again, maybe she's the best thing the GOP can have for the mid-terms and the Presidential elections. She is good for a laugh.
amr:
# ::snt This lady is cans light of a six pack. She needs to fade away. But then again, maybe she's the best thing the GOP can have for the mid-terms and the Presidential elections. She is good for a laugh.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (l / lady
            :mod (t / this)
            :ARG1-of (l2 / light-06
                  :mod (p / pack
                        :quant 6)))
      :snt2 (n / need-01
            :ARG0 (s / she)
            :ARG1 (f / fade-01
                  :ARG1 s
                  :direction (a / away)))
      :snt3 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG2 (p2 / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (t2 / thing
                        :ARG1-of (h / have-degree-91
                              :ARG2 (g / good-02
                                    :ARG1 t2)
                              :ARG3 (m2 / most))
                        :ARG1-of (h2 / have-03
                              :ARG0 (p3 / political-party
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "GOP"))
                              :purpose (a2 / and
                                    :op1 (m3 / mid-terms)
                                    :op2 (e / elect-01
                                          :ARG2 (p4 / president)))))
                  :mod (a3 / again
                        :mod (t3 / then))))
      :snt4 (g2 / good-03
            :ARG1 (s2 / she)
            :ARG2 (l3 / laugh-01)))
